task.title: Backing up using the browser interface
task.shortdesc: Using the browser interface, you can back up your entire system.

taskbody.context: The default directory that receives backups is /opt/serviced/var/backups.

step.cmd: Log in to the browser interface.
At the prompt, confirm your selection by clicking Create Backup again.
step.stepresult: When the backup is complete, the compressed archive file name is displayed.
